creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black band; ends decorated similarly with radiating diamond designs with slightly different central motifs, predominately in red, pink and white; straight and zigzag embroidered lines in predominately pink and white at three edges of diamond panels; ends edges in red fabric--machine sewn; edging at ends with groups of three discs embroidered in pink, salmon, purple, gold, white and green, and red fabric knots at edges
title: Head wrap
